title: What is something so common on TV but you haven't experienced it yourself ever? - Quora

response.answer_text: Heroine falling from the chair and then the hero catches her in his arms like a toy and then they will constantly look each other into their partner's eyes. But the reality is ......If a girl falls from the chair then definitely she will get scolded by her husband or boyfriend that...What the hell were you doing? Can't you just be careful? Or ARE YOU OK? Hope you have a nice day ahead!
